data.title: Selected Bibliography for Kenneth J. Arrow
data.text:
Research Associate and Instructor in the Department of Economics, 1947-48; Assistant Professor, 1948-49.

Awarded the Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel, 1972

"Sustainability and the Measurement of Wealth: Further Reflections." Kenneth J. Arrow, Partha Dasgupta, Lawrence H. Goulder, Kevin J. Mumford and Kirsten Oleson; Environment and Development Economics, 2013, 18(4), pp. 504-16.

http://dx.doi.org/10.1017/S1355770X13000193

"The Economics of Inventive Activity over Fifty Years," Kenneth J. Arrow, in J. Lerner and S. Stern: The Rate and Direction of Inventive Activity Revisited. Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 2012, pp. 43-48

Managerial Logic; Hervé Raynaud and Kenneth J. Arrow; Hoboken, NJ: John Wiley and Sons, 2011

Handbook of Social Choice and Welfare. Volume 2; Kenneth J. Arrow, Amartya Sen and Kotaro Suzumura; Amsterdam: Elsevier / North Holland, 2011

"How Growth Can Undermine Growth: Three Examples," Kenneth J. Arrow, in O. de La Grandville: Economic Growth and Development. Bedfordshire, U.K.: Emerald, 2011, pp. 1-7
